meanings.definition: A complex organic substance that is a major component of plant cell walls, consisting of cellulose, lignin, and hemicelluloses.
meanings.sent1: The lignocellulose in the plant cell walls provides structural support.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying lignocellulose to develop sustainable materials.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used lignocellulose to build a tiny fort in the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as lignocellulose, holding her dreams together.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh lignocellulose filled the air after the storm.
